dcterms:creator: Mona Diab
Nizar Habash
Owen Rambow
Ryan Roth
dcterms:description: The Penn Arabic Treebank (PATB) is a dataset used for Arabic diacritization, consisting of a training subset with 15,789 lines. It serves as a benchmark for evaluating diacritization models.
dcterms:title: Penn Arabic Treebank (PATB)

dcterms:description: Global Voices is a multilingual corpus that provides parallel text data for various languages, useful for training machine translation models.
dcterms:title: Global Voices

dcterms:creator: Ahmed El-Kishky
Vishrav Chaudhary
Francisco Guzmán
Philipp Koehn
dcterms:description: CCAligned is a large collection of cross-lingual web-document pairs that can be used for training multilingual models.
dcterms:title: CCAligned

dcterms:description: News Commentary is a dataset containing commentary translations, useful for training and evaluating machine translation systems.
dcterms:title: News Commentary

dcterms:creator: Michał Ziemski
Marcin Junczys-Dowmunt
Bruno Pouliquen
dcterms:description: The United Nations parallel corpus is a multilingual dataset that provides translations of UN documents, useful for training translation models.
dcterms:title: United Nations

dcterms:creator: Holger Schwenk
Vishrav Chaudhary
Shuo Sun
Hongyu Gong
Francisco Guzmán
dcterms:description: WikiMatrix is a dataset that contains parallel sentences mined from Wikipedia across multiple languages, useful for training multilingual models.
dcterms:title: WikiMatrix

dcterms:creator: Christos Christodouloupoulos
Mark Steedman
dcterms:description: The Arabic Bible dataset is a massively parallel corpus containing the Bible translated into 100 languages, useful for linguistic studies and translation tasks.
dcterms:title: Arabic Bible

dcterms:creator: Taha Zerrouki
Amar Balla
dcterms:description: Tashkeela is a novel corpus of Arabic vocalized texts, providing data for auto-diacritization systems.
dcterms:title: Tashkeela
